title: alpharun
author: alpharun
content: I recovered a bitcoin wallet from 2013, why didn't I find the corresponding bitcoin cash?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: This guide would be helpful: LoyceV's Bitcoin Fork claiming guide (and service)

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: First: move (bottom-left) this topic to the altcoin boards.Then: I assume you used a Bitcoin wallet to recover your funds. A Bitcoin wallet doesn't support Forkcoins, you're going to need to use the respective Forkcoin wallets. I wrote a topic about this years ago. The prices in that topic are outdated, but the warnings are still valid. Move your Bitcoins to a safe new wallet before doing anything Forkcoin related, and learn what the lack of replay protection means before doing anything else.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.created_time: September 05, 2023, 04:04:08 PMLast edit: September 05, 2023, 04:24:21 PM by Rikafip
comments.body: Why is this in Croatian board?@alpharun please move it to the appropriate section
